mapper.select: SELECT A.WF_STEP_ID /* 워크플로우 스텝ID */ , B.STEP_NM /* 워크플로우 스텝명 */ , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.WF_MAP_ID = 'WF01' THEN 1 END) AS WF01_COUNT /* 등록 카운트 */ , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.WF_MAP_ID = 'WF02' THEN 1 END) AS WF02_COUNT /* 수정 카운트 */ , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.WF_MAP_ID = 'WF03' THEN 1 END) AS WF03_COUNT /* 삭제 카운트 */ FROM WF A LEFT JOIN WF_STEP B ON A.WF_MAP_ID = B.WF_MAP_ID AND A.WF_STEP_ID = B.STEP_ID GROUP BY A.WF_STEP_ID , B.STEP_NM ORDER BY A.WF_STEP_ID , B.STEP_NM

SELECT A.WF_ID /* 딜명 */ , A.APRV_DTTM /* 결재일자 */ , C.DPRT_NM /* 부서 */ , B.WF_MAP_NM /* 업무구분 */ , A.RTN_YN /* 결재구분(반송여부) */ , A.MEMO_CNTS /* 결재사유 */ , (SELECT SC.EMP_NM /* 사원이름 */ FROM WF_STEP SA /* 워크플로우 스탭 */ JOIN WF_HIS SB /* 워크플로우 이력 */ ON SA.WF_MAP_ID = SB.WF_MAP_ID /* 맵아이디 */ AND SA.STEP_ID = SB.WF_STEP_ID /* 스탭아이디 */ AND A.WF_ID = SB.WF_ID /* 워크플로우아이디 */ JOIN IBIMS003B SC /* 사원기본 */ ON SB.APRV_EMP_NO = SC.EMPNO /* 사번 */ WHERE A.WF_MAP_ID = SA.WF_MAP_ID /* 맵아이디*/ AND A.WF_STEP_ID = SA.NEXT_STEP_ID /* 현재스탭과 다음스탭 비교 */ ) AS RRE_STEP /* 이전결재자 */ FROM WF A /* 워크플로우 */ LEFT JOIN WF_MAP B /*워크플로우맵 */ ON A.WF_MAP_ID = B.WF_MAP_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS003B C /* 사원기본 */ ON C.EMPNO = A.APRV_EMP_NO /* 사번 */ WHERE A.WF_STEP_ID = #{wfStepId} AND A.WF_MAP_ID = #{wfMapId} ORDER BY A.WF_STEP_ID

SELECT A.APRV_DTTM /* 결재일자 */ , A.WF_STEP_ID /* 결재단계 */ , A.RTN_YN /* 결재구분 */ , B.EMP_NM /* 결재자 */ , A.RTN_CNTS /* 반송사유 */ FROM WF_HIS A /* 워크플로우 이력*/ JOIN IBIMS003B B /* 사원기본 */ ON A.APRV_EMP_NO = B.EMPNO /* 사번 */ WHERE A.WF_ID = #{wfId} AND A.WF_MAP_ID = #{wfMapId} ORDER BY A.WF_STEP_ID
